name: Reigns of Samosbor
storyline: Imagine a giant house, that has billions of apartments, whose corridors are dangerous and contain many secrets. The entire house is controlled by the almighty Party - the last stronghold of order in this insane world. It is here that you will take on the leadership role of one of the settlements.
summary: Try on the role of Head of the Bloc, one of the many settlements inside Gigakhrushchevka. Lead your Bloc through the horrors of Samosbor, conspiracies and lack of resources. Make the right decisions and try to survive!
